text: The Superior Court may make such rules and regulations for conducting business in the Criminal Division of the court, consistent with statutes applicable to such business and in the manner provided in section 11-946, as it may deem necessary and proper.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Criminal Proceedings in the Superior Court.
